edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.shortestpath
Enum Color

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Color>
      edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.shortestpath.Color
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Color>
public enum Color
extends java.lang.Enum<Color>

Color is used by the classic Depth First Search algorithm in Graph theory. A color indicates if a vertex has been explored or not.

The following color states are defined:

  • WHITE The vertex has not been explored.
  • GRAY The vertex is being explored, one or more adjacent vertices have not been explored.
  • BLACK All adjacent vertices have been explored.

Version:
